.. _singularity_key_import:

singularity key import
----------------------

Import a local key into the local keyring

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'key import' command allows you to add a key to your local keyring from a 
  specific file.

::

  singularity key import [import options...] <input-key>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ singularity key import ./my-key.asc

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help           help for import
      --new-password   set a new password to the private key

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity key <singularity_key>` 	 - Manage OpenPGP keys

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 12-May-2020*
